events.comment: for more game examples and templates visit gametemplates.itch.io
initialize values and timers
udate balance text to display current balance
set color of small spin buttons to indicate if we can use them or not
spin slots if they flaged to spin

If the big SPIN button is pressed, flag slots to spin with a little delay between each
but only if we have enough balance, each slot cost $1 to spin
and spin only if the slots are not already spinning
set canSpinManually back to 1 so we can after spin each slot manually again

If the slot SPIN button is pressed, flag slot to spin individually
but only if we have enough  balance, each slot cost $1 to spin 
and only if the slots are not already spinning 
and if we are allowed to spin manually, in case we win, after we must use the big button to spin all 3 to avoid the player spinning only 1 and constantly win
If big STOP button is pressed, stop all slots with a little delay between each
If the slot STOP button is pressed, stop slots individually
if none of the slot is spinning
get what fruit is colliding in the slot with the red line if any
check if we win any money or not if we did, add the money to the balance and set canSpinManually to 0 so we must use the big button to spin all slots to avoid player spin only 1 and win all the time
if all 3 slot is the same
if it not empty, all 3 slot got a fruit, any fruit, win 1$
if all 3 is a cherry, win additional $4
if all 3 is grape, win additional $3
if all 3 is lemon, win additional $2
if all 3 is melon, win additional $1
if no slot is spinning now and the balance is 0, that means Game Over, lost all the money we have
wait a few seconds and then go to game over screen

objects.name: Title
objects.string: You have lost all your money. Game Over
